full_summary:
===============

## Government Tender Announcement

### Reference Number

* Reference Number: WS4232044517-DOC4343753816

### Solicitation and Amendment Number

* Solicitation Number: WS4232044517
* Amendment Number: 3

### Publication Date and Closing Date

* Publication Date: December 7, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 29, 2023, 14:00 EST

### Category and Method

* Category: Service
* Method: Competitive Selective Tendering

### Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking offers from suppliers to provide accommodation services to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) in Temecula, California.

These services are required from March 20, 2024, to July 2, 2024.

### Notice and Attachments

For more information, please visit the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18221917?extsite=MTgyMjE5MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

* Name: Hunter, Martine (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

### Trade Agreements

The following trade agreements are in effect:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Region and Delivery

* Delivery Location: United States of America
* Delivery Region: Hotel and Lodging with Meeting Facilities in Temecula, California.

This tender solicitation cancels and replaces previous bid solicitation number W2037-240090/A dated December 7, 2023, with a closing of December 21, 2023, at 2 p.m. EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. 
All bids submitted after the 29th of December 2023 at 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 29,
